sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser' import { level, categoryClass, generateMedia } from './utils' const Card = props => { const { difficulty, tags, prompt } = props.data const side = props.side const levelData = level(difficulty) const media = side === 'front' ? question.prompt_media.map(item => generateMedia(item)) : question.answer_media.map(item => generateMedia(item)) const cateoryTagClass = categoryClass(tags[0] || 'Uncategorized') return (
 {levelData.text}

{side === 'front' ? `Question` : `Answer`}

{ tags && tags.length ? tags.map((tag, i) => (  {tag} )) : null }
{ ReactHtmlParser(prompt) }
{ media }
{/* className="peach-bg-gradient"> */}
) } export default Card;
